sentences.english: A variety of conifers and hardwoods makes up the bulk of the vegetation .
sentences.chinese: 大部分植被由各種針葉樹類和闊葉樹類構成。

sentences.english: Abaxial surface of calyx with needle-like prickles.
sentences.chinese: 背面花萼具針葉象一樣皮刺。

sentences.english: In some conifers adventitious roots can form the largest part of the root system.
sentences.chinese: 在一些針葉樹不定根形成的根系統的最大部分。

sentences.english: As a rule, in the Northwest, these hosts are various kinds of conifer trees.
sentences.chinese: 作爲一項規則，西北，這些主機是針葉樹各種樹木。

sentences.english: One tiny acerola cherry has vitamin C equal to that found in four oranges.
sentences.chinese: 一顆小小的針葉櫻桃，其維他命C含量等同四個鮮橙。

sentences.english: Bees produce a compound called propolis from the sap on needle-leaved trees or evergreens.
sentences.chinese: 蜜蜂利用針葉樹或常綠植物的汁液製造蜂膠化合物。

sentences.english: Ice encased each of the needles in a clear jacket.
sentences.chinese: 針葉上裹着冰晶，像穿着潔淨的夾克衫。

sentences.english: Now instead of coniferous forests there are just carbonized remains of trees and voids.
sentences.chinese: 現在沒有了針葉林，只有碳化的樹木和空洞依然存在。

sentences.english: The trouble is, other conifer eates didn't exhibit the same cancer.
sentences.chinese: 但問題是，其它喫針葉樹的恐龍並沒有患同樣的癌症。

sentences.english: Coniferous chemical wood pulp, sulphite other than dissolving grades, unbleached.
sentences.chinese: 針葉樹亞硫酸鹽化學木漿，溶解級除外，未漂白。

sentences.english: The results indicated that the average water consumption rate of broadleaf trees was more than conifer trees.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，針葉樹種耗水速率低於闊葉樹種。

sentences.english: In conifer orchards new stumps should be removed.
sentences.chinese: 在針葉樹的種子園，新的伐樁應予除掉。

sentences.english: The road was covered with fir needles.
sentences.chinese: 這條路上鋪滿了冷杉針葉。

sentences.english: Some hardy plants such as junipers can be potted in June.
sentences.chinese: 六月份時，一些針葉科植物如杜松可進行盆栽。

sentences.english: Conifer forests cover the eastern versant.
sentences.chinese: 東部山區被針葉樹林覆蓋。

sentences.english: The Baikushev's Pine is a coniferous tree from the species Bosnian Pine situated in Pirin, Bulgaria.
sentences.chinese: 百庫西樹是針葉樹源於保加利亞波斯尼亞松物種。

definition: to be shaded or concealed by foliage/to conceal/hidden/covert/shade (of a tree)
(bird species of China) grey heron (Ardea cinerea)
Lishu county in Siping 四平, Jilin/Lishu district of Jixi city 雞西|鸡西[Ji1 xi1], Heilongjiang
